title: Payment and Delivery System Transformation
description: The United States is undergoing a profound shift in how healthcare is delivered and paid for, with stakeholders across the healthcare industry—from public coverage programs to health plans to clinicians —coming together to pioneer new payment and delivery models. Manatt’s Payment and Delivery System Transformation Insights give real-time information and analysis on emerging payment solutions and population health models as well as the legal, regulatory and policy environment influencing innovation.
